title: attestation report
extract: attestation report - a consulting service in which a CPA expresses a conclusion about the reliability of a written statement that is the responsibility of someone else. attestation service. consulting service - service provided by a professional advisor (e.g., a lawyer or doctor or CPA etc.)
extract_html: attestation report - a consulting service in which a CPA expresses a conclusion about the reliability of a written statement that is the responsibility of someone else. attestation service. consulting service - service provided by a professional advisor (e.g., a lawyer or doctor or CPA etc.)
